('6b8129fb-20dd-4298-bd8e-3eb340fffe9f', 'COMMUNITY_BOARD_GROUP','PRIVACY_OPTIONS', 'Privacy Options', null, null, 'STRING', 'THIS_IS_A_PUBLIC_GROUPS', '["THIS_IS_A_PUBLIC_GROUPS", "THIS_IS_A_PRIVATE_GROUPS", "THIS_IS_A_HIDDEN_GROUPS"]', 1, false, '{"THIS_IS_A_PUBLIC_GROUPS": ["Any site member can join this group.", "This group will be listed in the groups directory and in search results.", "Group content and activity will be visible to any site member."], "THIS_IS_A_PRIVATE_GROUPS": ["Only People who request access and are accepted can join this group.", "This group will be listed in the groups directory and in search results.", "Group content and activity will only be visible to members of the group."], "THIS_IS_A_HIDDEN_GROUPS": ["Only people who are invited can join this group.", "This group will not be listed in the groups directory or search results.", "Group content and activity will only be visible to members of the group."]}'),
